page.title: 15Mrs. Malkin (Lisa Clayton)
page.content: Mrs Malkin is well known in Cheadle. She is a Governor of the Painsley R.C. High School & has several times been chosen to be the Chairman of Governors.She once taught at Saint Giles & also at the Painsley but she is now retired.She is a J.P. & a Magistrate.She has to go to Court each Tuesday & on the first Friday of each month.She attends the Court which deals with Domestic Affairs now as she is too old to attend the Juvenile Court.She enjoys making soft toys & she is a keen golfer. She plays on the Course at Whiston which is surrounded by lovely Moorland scenery.She & Mr Malkin have both been presented with special Awards by Pope John Paul for their work in Catholic Education.
